bilingual.source: Mrs Smith was extremely cross about the behaviour of the housekeeper.
bilingual.target: 史密斯夫人对管家的行为非常生气。

bilingual.source: It is extremely beautiful and you can experience the indigenous Australia there more than anywhere else.
bilingual.target: 那里非常美丽，你可以比在其他地方更多地体验到澳大利亚的原住民文化。
这道数学题非常难对付。

list.abstract: extremely（[ɪkˈstriːmli]），英语单词。词性是副词，释义为非常；极端地；极其。例句：His monstrous pearl was extremely valuable.（他那颗巨大的珍珠极其珍贵）。 作副词时，近义词为highly、greatly。

yingyinNormal.en: Because what the algorithms gave us was extremely spectacular. Even Kip was surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为数学算法所提供给我们的，非常壮观。甚至基普都感到惊讶。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Yes. You were very natural in front of the camera, and I found your suggestions extremely helpful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？真的，你在镜头面前表现得很自然，而且我觉得你建议非常有用。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure it's extremely frustrating. Thank you. And also a little sad. Okay, now you're just showing off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想必是非常烦心吧。是的，谢谢。还有点小伤心吧。够了，你现在就是在显摆你会读。

yingyinNormal.en: So it's actually extremely high amount of negativity fear and anxiety about China, Sino-phobia that I think is not just misinformed but also misleading, and ultimately dangerous, very dangerous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，有大量的对中国负面的恐慌和焦虑中国恐惧症，我认为这不仅是错误的消息，还造成了误导，最终是危险的非常危险。

yingyinNormal.en: Well you're being extremely unfair!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这样太不公平了！

yingyinNormal.en: This is extremely good. Watch this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这会让你大开眼界，看仔细了。

yingyinNormal.en: My father evidently was extremely intelligent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父亲据说极其聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: That sounds very dangerous. It is. Extremely so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听上去真够危险的。没错，极其危险。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: No,you didn't. But keep in mind, I felt extremely important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，你不必。但你记得，那让我觉得自己是个超级大人物。

yingyinNormal.en: You should know that my son has extremely delicate digestion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我儿子消化不良。

yingyinNormal.en: Kite fighting? Oh, yeah. It's an extremely competitive, cutthroat sport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斗风筝？对，一项极具竞争性和激烈性的运动。

yingyinNormal.en: Be that as it may, it was an extremely foolish thing to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就算是这样，这么做可真是愚蠢极了。

yingyinNormal.en: She was loyal. And careful. All of this feels extremely unlike her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的确很忠诚，小心谨慎，这些都不像她会做的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Keep me alive for the next six hours. That would be extremely helpful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 确保接下来的六小时我能活着，这一点至关重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Far from shocked, I am extremely impressed. And you have a son? Yes. George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我并不震惊，而是深感钦佩，你有个儿子？是的，乔治。

yingyinNormal.en: That's extremely rude. Don't listen to him, Balthazar. You're classically handsome.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，这样很没礼貌，别听他乱说，巴尔萨泽，你很英俊潇洒。

yingyinNormal.en: An extremely costly method, of hijacking the hippocampus to clear traumatic memories.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一种极其昂贵的通过控制海马体清除创伤记忆的手段。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't deny that, by comparison our internal plumbing is extremely high maintenance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能否认，比较而言，我们的内部下水系统太难伺候了。

yingyinNormal.en: I know it doesn't seem like it to you, but, for me, what we have is extremely intimate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你可能不这样想，但是对我来说，我们的关系已经是极度亲密了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, try to see things from my point of view. I am extremely disappointed with my life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，试着从我的角度考虑考虑，我对自己的生活失望透顶。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is usually <highlight>extremely</highlight> difficult to find the material they actually provided or worked on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常很难找到他们实际提供或研究过的材料。

examination_example.sentence: If those faces are blank and unresponsive — as they often are when absorbed in a device — it can be <highlight>extremely</highlight> disconcerting for the children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这些面孔面无表情、毫无反应，就像他们经常全神贯注于（电子）设备时经常出现的那样，可能会让孩子们非常不安。

examination_example.sentence: Some people with a high BMI are in fact <highlight>extremely</highlight> fit, while others with a low BMI may be in poor shape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些BMI高的人实际上非常健康。而另一些虽然BMI低，但身材却很差。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 非常；极端地；极其；很

word_family.mean: adj. 极大的；极度的；最外的；最远的；不寻常的；例外的；极端严厉（或严重）的；极端的；偏激的

examination_example.sentence: If you see her, you're <highlight>extremely</highlight> lucky for she's the most beautiful creature alive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你看到她，就非常幸运，因为她是世界上最美丽的生物。

examination_example.sentence: The disadvantage is that such equipment will be <highlight>extremely</highlight> expensive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 缺点是这种设备将非常昂贵。
